name: SlotLeague Time Trials
description:
Compete against other players for the best time trial on the official SlotLeague Time Trials slot car racing tracks!

If you feel like creating your own racing track just hand draw it on a paper and use your device camera to take a photo of it!.

Go straight to the challenge simply downloading the official tracks, taking time trials and then the game will upload to the server your best lap automatically so you can check your skills against other players time trials on the "Ranked Race" feature.

Race on the track against a car representing your best ever lap time and another representing a player better ranked than yourself! ( Or yourself if no one can beat you... ;)

Specially designed for mobile (simplest control mechanism and internet offline time trials is possible).
